document.full_text: by thursday morning the last line of defense came down to this: a police water cannon, a helicopter maneuver designed for wildfires and a race against time to get the fukushima daiichi nuclear power plant rewired to the grid.
document.title: special report: mistakes, misfortune, meltdown: japan's quake
lines_and_colors: by thursday morning the last line of defense came down to this: a police water cannon, a helicopter maneuver designed for wildfires and a race against time to get the fukushima daiichi nuclear power plant rewired to the grid.
